document.full_text: a state transportation crackdown in the wake of last month's deadly bronx bus crash has taken 124 bus drivers and 96 buses off new york roads, officials said..
document.title: new york cracks down on bus safety after deadly accident
lines_and_colors: a state transportation crackdown in the wake of last month's deadly bronx bus crash has taken 124 bus drivers and 96 buses off new york roads, officials said..
